name: Into the Darkness - House Awakens
description:
You are a teenager who is dropped off at home by your mom. You decide you hate Christmas and Santa Claus. There is news that an escaped mental patient dressed as Santa Claus is terrorizing your neighborhood. Bad news comes that Santa Claus has spotted your home as a spot to hunt. 

Hide and wait all throughout the house until he doesn't spot you and moves on from your presence.
